message: Lunch meetup today at 12:30 at Sam's in Hillsboro Village. http://maps.google.com/maps/place?hl=en&prmd=ivnscm&resnum=4&bav=on.1,or.&um=1&ie=UTF-8&q=sams+nashville&fb=1&gl=us&hq=sams&hnear=Nashville,+TN&cid=4593202201644732252&ei=UcdbTYyaKI-4twe2x9jrCw&sa=X&oi=local_result&ct=placepage-link&resnum=1&ved=0CCkQ4gkwAA
